label: Registration of Email and Mobile
description: Please provide your email and mobile number to start the registration process.

label: Personal Details
description: Enter your personal details, including name, date of birth, and address.

label: Location Details
description: Provide the location details of your residence.

label: Chief Occupant Details
description: Fill in the details of the chief occupant of the residence.

label: Confirmation
description: Review all the provided information and confirm to complete the registration.
